TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ErrorWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart implements class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable
Public Class ErrorWebPart Inherits ProxyWebPart Implements ITrackingPersonalizable

summary.span: 在尝试加载或创建动态 控件的新实例失败时，作为占位符插入网页。

span.span: Inserted into a Web page as a placeholder when the attempt to load or create a new instance of a dynamic control has failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由 Web 部件控件集作为一个占位符无法添加到页面的控件。The class is used by the Web Parts control set as a placeholder for a control that could not be added to the page. 如果控件尝试加载或创建动态的新实例中的控件区域，以及由于某种原因，则尝试将失败然后调用方法，并插入控件来代替失败的控件。If the control attempts to load or create a new instance of a dynamic control in a zone, and the attempt fails for some reason, the then calls the method, and inserts an control in place of the control that failed. 控件插入来保留以前现有个性化状态信息可能已存在的用户控件上。The control is inserted to preserve previously existing personalization state information that might have existed on a control for users. 例如，假定有控件具有可个性化的属性，以便用户可以将保存其自己的邮政编码，然后该控件可以自动显示为该邮政编码的天气信息每次用户访问该页。For example, suppose there is a control that has a personalizable property, so that users can save their own ZIP Code, and then the control can automatically display weather information for that ZIP Code each time the user visits the page. 如果在某个时间点出现问题天气控件，以便它无法加载特定请求过程且尚未页面的其余部分加载成功，用户已保存的自定义个性化设置数据的控件将会丢失下次个人保存 nalization 数据页。If at some point a problem occurs with the weather control so that it cannot be loaded during a specific request, and yet the rest of the page does load successfully, the custom personalization data that a user has saved for that control would be lost the next time the personalization data for the page is saved. 通过插入控件代替失败的控件，可以通知用户，出现了问题，并还提供一种 Web 部件控件集用来将失败的控件上的用户的个性化设置数据保留到问题的机制能够得到纠正。By inserting the control in place of the failed control, you can notify the user that a problem has occurred, and also provide a mechanism for the Web Parts control set to preserve the user's personalization data on the failed control until the problem can be corrected. 类派生自类，作为设计为其他类型的临时占位符的几种类型之一。The class derives from the class, as one of several types designed to be temporary placeholders for other types. 若要创建类的实例，控件使用其公共构造函数。To create an instance of the class, the control uses its public constructor. 构造函数需要的失败的控制要传递给它，如 ID，该控件的原始类型的若干详细信息 (如果失败的控件是一台服务器或用户控件包装在对象)，控件 （的源文件的原始路径如果失败的控件是一个用户控件），和的 ID如果存在的对象。The constructor requires several details of the failed control to be passed to it, such as the ID, the original type of the control (if the failed control is a server or user control wrapped in a object), the original path to the source file for the control (if the failed control is a user control), and the ID of a object if present. 类具有一个称为的公共属性。The class has a single public property called . 开发人员可以将值分配给时插入该控件将显示在网页上此属性。Developers can assign a value to this property that will be displayed in a Web page when the control is inserted. 类具有三个受保护的方法。The class has three protected methods. 方法采用样式特征从对象包含无法加载的控件的区域。The method takes style characteristics from the object for the zone that contains the control that failed to load. 如果此对象中存在的任何样式设置，该方法将它们应用于控件。If any style settings exist in this object, the method applies them to the control. 方法上设置几个重要的继承的属性控件，以防止用户通过隐藏、 最小化、 编辑或导出它，或更改个性化控制其值。The method sets several important inherited properties on the control, to prevent users from personalizing the control by hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting it, or changing its value. 最后，方法对中的字符串的值进行编码属性，以防止呈现问题或脚本的攻击。Finally, the method encodes the value of the string in the property, to prevent rendering problems or scripting attacks.

para.span: 在其中的条件控件实际插入到页情况非常少见，和类可以继承自和扩展，尽管很少开发人员会发现这很重要。

span.span: The conditions in which an control is actually inserted into a page are relatively rare, and although the class can be inherited from and extended, few developers will find this to be of great importance.

para.span: 你可能想要扩展此类的一个原因是如果你想要自定义外观和行为控件。

span.span: One reason you might want to extend this class is if you want to customize the appearance and behavior of the control.

para.span: 例如，你无法重写方法，并设置其他样式或上的其他属性控件之外，已设置。

span.span: For example, you could override the method, and set additional style or other properties on the control, beyond those that are already set.

para.span: 需要控件要使用自定义控件控件，则必须还从类并重写其方法。

span.span: To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method.

para.span: 在该方法中，你应分配方法的值参数的自定义属性管理，因为控件会从其他几个地方，调用此方法，并且通常会传入不同的错误消息值。

span.span: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and often passes in a different error message value.

MemberSignature.Value: public ErrorWebPart (string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID) cil managed
Public Sub New (originalID As String, originalTypeName As String, originalPath As String, genericWebPartID As String)
public: ErrorWebPart(System::String ^ originalID, System::String ^ originalTypeName, System::String ^ originalPath, System::String ^ genericWebPartID);

param.name: originalID
param.span: 字符串，失败控件的控件 ID（不是唯一 ID）。

span.span: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the failing control.

param.span: 如果失败涉及一个 控件，则该 ID 是其子服务器控件的 ID。

span.span: If a control is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.

param.name: originalTypeName
param.span: 字符串，失败控件的 名称。

span.span: A string that is the name of the of the failed control.

param.span: 如果失败涉及一个 控件，则该类型名称是其子服务器控件的类型。

span.span: If a control is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.

param.name: originalPath
param.span: 字符串，包含用户控件的路径（如果失败涉及包含子用户控件的 控件）。

span.span: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a control that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.

param.name: genericWebPartID
param.span: 字符串，返回 控件的 ID（如果控件的加载或创建操作失败涉及该类型的控件）。

span.span: A string that returns the ID of a control, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.

param.span: 不是从 基类继承的控件需要此参数。

span.span: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the base class.
Initializes a new instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件创建的新实例控制在尝试加载或创建的动态实例失败时会控件。The control creates a new instance of the control when it fails in an attempt to load or create an instance of a dynamic control. 动态控件是以编程方式，添加到页上的控件或通过将控件添加从控件的目录的用户，而不是静态控件中声明的网页上的标记。Dynamic controls are controls that are added to a page programmatically, or by a user who adds the control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page. 方法只需创建基本的类，将包含有关失败的控件的信息的四个参数传递给它的一个实例。The method simply creates an instance of the base class, passing to it the four parameters that contain information about the failed control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddAttributesToRender(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddAttributesToRender (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: ，包含要呈现的 HTML 输出。

span.span: An that contains the HTML output to be rendered.

summary.span: 将特殊错误样式特性应用于插入页中代替另一个控件的 对象。

span.span: Applies special error style attributes to an object that is inserted into a page in place of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法采用的样式特性 （如果有） 中定义对象包含区域控件。The method takes the style characteristics (if any) that are defined in the object for the zone that contains an control. 样式应用于之前呈现的控件。The styles are applied to the control prior to rendering.

para.span: 可以重写此方法在派生类，如果开发人员想要自定义应用于的样式特征控件。

span.span: This method can be overridden in a derived class, if developers want to customize the style characteristics that are applied to an control.

para.span: 需要控件要使用自定义控件控件，则必须还从类并重写其方法。

span.span: To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method.

para.span: 在该方法中，你应分配方法的值参数的自定义属性管理，因为控制从其他几个地方，调用此方法，并且通常将传入特定的错误消息。

span.span: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndLoadPersonalization() cil managed

summary.span: 在呈现之前设置 控件的几个重要属性，以防止用户能够对该控件进行个性化设置。

span.span: Sets several important properties on the control prior to rendering, to prevent users from being able to personalize the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法上设置属性呈现之前就进行控制。The method sets properties on an control before it is rendered. 这些属性可防止用户隐藏、 最小化、 编辑，或导出该控件，或更改其值。These properties prevent users from hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting the control, or changing its value. 但是，用户可以关闭或删除控件实例。However, users can close or delete an control instance.

para.span: 可以重写此方法中继承控件。

span.span: This method can be overridden in an inherited control.

para.span: 开发人员可能希望重写的方法来设置其他属性上的控件，如 default属性值。

span.span: Developers might want to override the method to set additional properties on the control, such as a default property value.

para.span: 需要控件要使用自定义控件控件，则必须还从类并重写其方法。

span.span: To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method.

para.span: 在该方法中，你应分配方法的值参数的自定义属性管理，因为控制从其他几个地方，调用此方法，并且通常将传入特定的错误消息。

span.span: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorMessage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置错误信息，该错误信息显示在网页中代替未能成功添加到该页的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed in a Web page in place of a control that could not be successfully added to the page.

value.span: 包含错误信息文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the error message.

value.span: 默认值为特定于区域性的错误信息。

span.span: The default value is a culture-specific error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以将值分配到开发人员，以便自定义错误消息显示在该点其中控件插入到页。The property can be assigned a value by a developer, so that a custom error message is displayed at the point where the control is inserted into a page.

para.span: 开发人员可以将默认值赋给通过扩展的属性类并在构造函数或中被重写方法，将默认值分配给属性。

span.span: Developers can assign a default value to the property by extending the class and, in the constructor or in an overridden method, assigning a default value to the property.

para.span: 需要控件要使用自定义控件控件，则必须还从类并重写其方法。

span.span: To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method.

para.span: 在该方法中，你应分配方法的值参数的自定义属性管理，因为控制从其他几个地方，调用此方法，并且通常将传入特定的错误消息。

span.span: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.

summary.span: 对 属性的字符串值进行编码。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法编码字符串分配给属性以确保它正确，呈现并防止脚本注入攻击。The method encodes the string assigned to the property to ensure that it renders properly, and to protect against script injection attacks.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否跟踪其更改的状态。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.

value.span: 如果由 Web 部件控件负责确定何时控件被视为已更改，则为 ；否则为 。
